title: # 355 - Jeff Dye & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the mancave with Jeff Dye to talk about passions for products, crazy people, what makes me mad, the time I got punched in the face, and much more!

Check out Jeffs Podcast "Jeff Dyes Friendship Podcast" wherever you get your podcasts and be on the look out in the future for his special "Dumb is Gooder".

This episode is brought to you by Vincero Watches. get 15% off when you go to www.vincerowatches.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Shady Rays sunglasses. Use promo code “Bertcast50” for 50% off of two or more items in the shade shop. Go to www.shadyrays.com 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. Get started today for just $5 when you go to www.forhims.com/Bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Earnest. Get a $100 cash bonus when you get a private student loan at www.earnest.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Honey. Honey is the smart shopping assistant that saves you time and money. Join free today at www.joinhoney.com/bert 

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
